column2: SELECT p.ra,p.dec,p.u,p.g,p.r,p.i,p.z,   --for the definition of rating used here, see Creaner et al, #, The Locus Algorithm: A technique for identifying optimised pointings for differential photometry   (#-abs(((p.g-@g_target)-((p.r-@r_target)))/@col_limit))*(#-abs(((p.r-@r_target)-((p.i-@i_target)))/@col_limit)) as rating        -- from the Photometric Objects Catalogue FROM PhotoObjAll AS p     WHERE    (     -- Reference in a FoV centred on the pointing      p.ra BETWEEN (@point_ra-(@fov_ra/#))  AND (@point_ra+(@fov_ra/#))      AND p.dec BETWEEN (@point_dec-(@fov/#)) AND (@point_dec+(@fov/#))   )    AND    (     -- Reference passes the Clean Sample of Point Sources tests 	((p.status & #)!=#)  	AND ((p.flags & #)!=#)  	AND ((p.flags & #)=#)  	AND (p.type = #)    )    AND    (     -- Reference magnitude is in the correct range 	p.r BETWEEN (@r_target-@mag_limit) AND (@r_target+@mag_limit)   )    AND    (     -- Reference colour is in the correct range 		(p.g - p.r) BETWEEN ((@g_target-@r_target)-@col_limit)AND((@g_target-@r_target)+@col_limit) 	AND 		(p.r - p.i) BETWEEN ((@r_target-@i_target)-@col_limit)AND((@r_target-@i_target)+@col_limit)   )         ORDER BY rating DESC
